title: 3 boys shot in Durham
content:
DURHAM, N.C. (AP) - Police are trying to find out why a teenager and two younger boys were shot in Durham.
Durham police said Sunday one of two 11-year-old boys is in serious condition, but is stable following surgery. Police found him, another 11-year-old boy and a 16-year-old male with gunshot wounds outside a Durham home late Saturday.
